entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
